content.rendered:
Foreword by Jack Canflied
‘There is no other book available anywhere in the world that contains this much entrepreneurial experience, insight and wisdom in it.’

There are thousands of books on millionaire thinking. The knowledge they offer isn’t enough to get you to the highest ranks of wealth. The richest people of our times are billionaires. Only 1 in 5 million world citizens belongs to this group.

Billionaires are extremely rare, and their mindsets differ hugely from that of ordinary people.

The book you are holding in your hands offers firsthand knowledge of billionaire entrepreneurs told in their own words. Never before has someone interviewed 20+ self-made billionaires across the world for a book project. The author worked for years with some of the very best entrepreneurs on the planet and distilled their secrets into 20 mental principles. The same principles enabled them to start from zero and create billions of dollars in value during one life span.

This book gives you the road map to follow their path to extreme wealth and success.

This book is recommend by billionaires

‘I recommend all entrepreneurs to have a look at this sensational book.’
Cho Tak Wong, self-made billionaire and the World Entrepreneur of the Year 2009

‘I highly recommend this book. It is a very thoroughly researched book on successful philosophies of life.’
Tony Tan Caktiong, self-made billionaire and the World Entrepreneur of the Year 2004
